description: This Kotlin source file defines the CartAdapter class, which is a RecyclerView adapter responsible for displaying and managing items in a shopping cart interface within an Android app. It handles binding cart item data to UI elements, updating item quantities, editing item details, and removing items from the cart.

classes.name: CartAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying cart items, with callbacks for incrementing, decrementing, editing, and removing items.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that holds references to UI components for a cart item.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds cart line data to the ViewHolder's UI elements and sets up event listeners.
